settings.heading: Personal Information Privacy Poilcy
settings.row_content:
Wherever your Personal Information may be held within SILICIUM LABORATORIES LLC or on its behalf, we take reasonable and appropriate steps to protect the Personal Information that you share with us from unauthorized access or disclosure. All your ordering information — including your name, address and credit card number — is encrypted using a secure server for maximum security. 

For site security purposes and to ensure that this service remains available to all users, SILICIUM LABORATORIES LLC web servers employ industry-standard methods to monitor network traffic to identify unauthorized attempts to upload or change information, or otherwise cause damage.

settings.heading: Strictly Prohibited Policy
settings.row_content:
Unauthorized attempts to upload information or change information on SILICIUM LABORATORIES LLC‘S servers are strictly prohibited and may be punishable by law, including under the Computer Fraud and Abuse Act of 1986 and the National Information Infrastructure Protection Act. 

In the specific context of this security monitoring, there is no expectation of privacy. However, only in the case of actual law enforcement investigations, will we attempt to identify individual users or their usage habits.
